ui_modal_installationpath_error_body:
It looks like the program files of Wallpaper Engine have been moved after the installation. This breaks the auto start function and causes a number of problems.

You are currently running Wallpaper Engine from {{runPath}} but [[[Platform]]] has installed Wallpaper Engine to {{steamPath}}. The auto start needs to be updated to use [[[Platform]]]'s correct installation path or this message will continue to appear.

Fix this now?
ui_browse_playlist_too_many_items: Too many wallpapers in the playlist to display.
ui_browse_playlist_modal_settings_begin_: Always begin with the first wallpaper
ui_browse_modal_no_steam_body:
[[[Sdk]]] could not be initialized. Please try to restart [[[Platform]]] and afterwards Wallpaper Engine. If you continue seeing this error, this means that your PC cannot correctly authenticate with the [[[Platform]]] servers, check your internet connection and whether you are logged into the correct [[[Platform]]] account.

Do not launch [[[Platform]]] as administrator, that prevents [[[Sdk]]] from connecting to [[[Platform]]]. An anti-virus or security software could be preventing [[[Platform]]] and Wallpaper Engine from working together as well, try turning that off.

Check the FAQ to get more help if needed: Fix [[[Platform]]] Connection
ui_browse_modal_seasonal_info_body:
We have changed the theme of Wallpaper Engine to match the occasion! The theme will be changed back in a couple of days.

You can disable seasonal theming in the settings if you don't like this or change the skin there any time.

The Discover tab also has a special list of wallpapers that match the holiday!
ui_browse_modal_steam_redownload_error_b:
Wallpaper Engine has detected that a lot of your wallpapers are being downloaded by [[[Platform]]] right now.

If you have recently subscribed a lot of new wallpapers, then please ignore this message and wait for [[[Platform]]] to finish downloading everything.

If it looks like [[[Platform]]] is downloading a lot of wallpapers that you already downloaded before, then [[[Platform]]] has run into an error. This is not a bug in Wallpaper Engine. Please see this post Fix [[[Platform]]] re-downloading everything or wait for [[[Platform]]] to finish downloading and fix itself.
ui_settings_plugins_options_led_plugin_d: Controls LED effects from Corsair and Razer devices.
